title: Pearl Masters MRP
text:
Til Sölu Pearl Masters MRP Sunrise Fade trommusett, trommurna eru: 22“x18 bassatromma,10”x8 Tom, 12“x9 Tom,14”x14 Floortom og 16“x16 Floortom, 12”x5 Marc Quinones Signature Snare,Pearl Icon rack og hardware fylgir. Verð 350 þús.
http://www.cream-music.com/images/product_images/popup_images/9929_0_Pearl_MRP_Masters_Premium__1__1024x768.jpg?XTCsid=6fs0ptgjvu0cgei7de1t6ao1h4

replies.text: 12" Quinones snerill er seldur, settid fer á 300 þús!
